-e ---

𓇍 #ỉỉ #jj •irba ⇔ 𓂻 𓇋 𓇋𓇋
𓇍 ج ي ء ʒ-y-ʾ jir:come
𓇍 iddya @ Gothic "follow" ⇔ leisten (afar)

𒂊𒈬 ᶜe-mu
𒂊𒈬 (be)come, to become, tongue of a plow “Kamm”

𒂵𒈾 ga-na •gomona
𒂵𒈾 come on

𓇍 בא ba va follow 𓇍 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓅪 𓏥 fault!
𓇍 בא baid 𓇍 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓅪 𓏥 bad!
𓇍 ir irr 𓇍 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓅪 𓏥 errat!
𓇍 šul? 𓇍 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓅪 𓏥 schlecht ⇔ 𓆄𓂻 ⋍ 𓈝
𓇍 come commit crime

𓇍 The hieratic sign for 𓇍 was similar to 'K' meaning come
𓇋 the feather in 'come' might come from 𓆎comb 𓇋𓆭 𓈙𓅓 faire𓂻?

𓇍 promotio
𓇍𓅓𓊵𓏏𓊪 Imhotep ⋍ Prometheus
𓇍𓅓𓊵𓏏𓊪 Imhotep "come(s) in peace"
